attributes.additional_details: need to stamp out all type of bullying we need more education in schools colleges and even places in work where people can go and talk about their feelings there should be classes so young people or adults feel safe to go some where to talk bullying should be stop all type of bullying such as cyberbullying and bullying people at work and being different all bullying should stop all together let stop bullying and make it history and also make strict pushiment for bullys too who bully people in schools colleges or even workplaces
